title: The Clever Fox
subject: English

objectives.outcome: Students will be able to identify characters and retell the story 'The Clever Fox' using key events

lesson_text: A clever fox outwitted the other animals. He used his wits to help the forest community.

activities.instructions: Read the text aloud using your microphone. Follow the AI's pacing and pronunciation.
Retell the story in your own words, highlighting the key characters and events.
Answer multiple-choice questions based on the story.

ai_dialogue_script.text: Hello! I am Ollie the Owl, let's read a story today!
Here is the text. Follow along and read with me.
Great! Let me check your reading...
Now try to retell the story in your own words.
Well done! You earned XP and badges!

online_gamified_implementation: Drag-drop vocabulary with images, interactive retell with ASR scoring, animated feedback for correct/incorrect, XP bar increment, badge unlock animations.
